attributes.action: All F1 races on free-to-air TV
attributes.additional_details: Today it was announced that from 2012, the BBC will share it's broadcast of F1 races with Sky Sports.  All races will be on Sky Sports and only half of the races will be on the BBC.  Why should the public have to view by subscription when the BBC were doing so well.  This decision has taken a popular sports away from the public.
